column5: Beautiful townhome located in the heart of Horseshoe Bay Resort! One of 10 units located right across Horseshoe Bay Resort Hotel with it's own private pool, patio, grill. This 2 Bed/2ba sleeps 5 guests. There is a queen sofa bed in the Living to accomodate the 5 guest. Enjoy dining by the pool or late nights visiting on the private deck/patio
column8: HSB townhome with pool steps to the HSB resort
